results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በውስጧ ያለውንም ሁሉ በጣለችና ባዶ በኾነች ጊዜ፤
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ለጌታዋም በሰማች ጊዜ፤ (መስማት) ተገባትም፤ (ሰው ሁሉ ሥራውን ይገናኛል)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: አንተ ሰው ሆይ! አንተ ጌታህን (በሞት) እስከምትገናኝ ድረስ ልፋትን ለፊ ነህ፤ ተገናኚውም ነህ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
